item.title: Top News BGIL Films Withdraws ₹79 Cr Warrant Issue Application 1 hour ago Bgil Films & Technologies Limited has withdrawn its application for BSE's in-principle approval for a ₹79.12 crore convertible equity warrants issue. The decision was made due to prolonged approval delays leading to investor withdrawals. The original proposal involved issuing 5.65 crore warrants at ₹14 each to 74 non-promoter investors. The company plans to explore alternative fund-raising options and may approach the exchange again with new investor commitments.
item.description: Top News BGIL Films Withdraws ₹79 Cr Warrant Issue Application 1 hour ago Bgil Films & Technologies Limited has withdrawn its application for BSE's in-principle approval for a ₹79.12 crore convertible equity warrants issue. The decision was made due to prolonged approval delays leading to investor withdrawals. The original proposal involved issuing 5.65 crore warrants at ₹14 each to 74 non-promoter investors. The company plans to explore alternative fund-raising options and may approach the exchange again with new investor commitments.

item.title: Zee Media Faces ₹18.11 Cr Copyright Claim in Pre-Institution Mediation 30 minutes ago Zee Media Corporation has disclosed pre-institution mediation proceedings initiated by Mr. Saumyajit Sen alias Ronny Sen for alleged copyright infringement, with claims totaling ₹18.11 crores plus 18% interest. The company maintains confidence in its defense and expects no financial implications from the proceedings.
item.description: Zee Media Faces ₹18.11 Cr Copyright Claim in Pre-Institution Mediation 30 minutes ago Zee Media Corporation has disclosed pre-institution mediation proceedings initiated by Mr. Saumyajit Sen alias Ronny Sen for alleged copyright infringement, with claims totaling ₹18.11 crores plus 18% interest. The company maintains confidence in its defense and expects no financial implications from the proceedings.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Close Marginally Lower Amid Fog-Related Flight Disruptions 5 hours ago Indian stock markets closed marginally lower on December 15, with Nifty 50 down 0.12% and Sensex down 0.06%. Market breadth was slightly positive with 2,370 stocks advancing and 2,266 declining. InterGlobe Aviation (IndiGo) buzzed due to flight disruptions caused by fog and potential regulatory scrutiny, highlighting challenges in the aviation sector.
item.description: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Close Marginally Lower Amid Fog-Related Flight Disruptions 5 hours ago Indian stock markets closed marginally lower on December 15, with Nifty 50 down 0.12% and Sensex down 0.06%. Market breadth was slightly positive with 2,370 stocks advancing and 2,266 declining. InterGlobe Aviation (IndiGo) buzzed due to flight disruptions caused by fog and potential regulatory scrutiny, highlighting challenges in the aviation sector.

item.title: Landmark Global Learning Limited Announces H1FY26 Earnings Conference Call for December 18, 2025 13 minutes ago Landmark Global Learning Limited has scheduled an earnings conference call for December 18, 2025, at 10:00 AM IST to discuss H1FY26 performance for the period ended September 30, 2025. The call will be led by Chairman Managing Director Mr. Jasmeet Singh Bhatia and Chief Operating Officer Mr. Pankaj Dawar, with multiple international dial-in options available for participants.
